title: E-commerce Content Writer
job_overview:
NO BEGINNERS WITH NO PROVEN BACKGROUND WILL BE ENTERTAINED.


We are looking for a passionate and knowledgeable Health and Wellness Content Writer with a strong background in ecommerce. The ideal candidate will craft engaging, educational, and SEO-optimized content for our store.

Your role will involve creating high-quality articles, email campaigns, course content, and marketing materials that resonate with our audience and inspire them to take actionable steps toward better health.

Key Responsibilities:
Content Creation: Write well-researched, evidence-based articles, blog posts, email campaigns, and promotional copies.
Course Development: Collaborate with subject matter experts to create content for online courses, including lesson outlines, video scripts, and downloadable resources. 
Email Marketing: Craft compelling email sequences to nurture leads, promote courses, and engage with our audience.
SEO Optimization: Conduct keyword research and apply best practices to ensure content ranks highly on search engines.
Research and Fact-Checking: Stay updated on trends in functional medicine, longevity science, and wellness practices, ensuring all content is accurate and credible.
Audience Engagement: Develop content strategies that resonate with health-conscious readers, building trust and authority in the field.
Collaboration: Work closely with marketing, product development, and design teams to align content with broader business goals.

Qualifications:
Proven experience as a content writer, preferably in health and wellness, with a portfolio showcasing expertise.
Strong understanding of longevity practices, functional medicine principles, and holistic health approaches.
Excellent writing, editing, and proofreading skills with the ability to adapt to different tones and styles.
Familiarity with SEO and digital marketing best practices.
Experience creating email campaigns, sales copy, and content for online courses.
Strong research skills, with the ability to simplify complex medical or scientific concepts for a general audience.

Preferred Skills:
Knowledge of health-related regulations and guidelines (e.g., FDA, HIPAA compliance).
Experience using email marketing platforms like Mailchimp, GoHighLevel
Certification or formal training in nutrition, wellness coaching, or a related field is a plus.

Application Instructions:

To help us get to know you better and understand your approach to medical content writing, please record a short video (2–3 minutes minimum) answering the following questions. Be yourself, speak clearly, and feel free to refer to your experience and examples where relevant.

???? Submit a video (2–3 minutes minimum) answering the questions below:

1.Tell us about your background in writing for ecommerce.
2. What makes a copy effective - be specific we're metric based so we need you to have an understanding on it as well.
3. How do you ensure the accuracy and credibility of your content?
4. Walk us through your research and fact-checking process.
5. How do you adjust your tone for different audiences?
6. Feel free to mention tools, platforms, or strategies you've used.

And lastly, please send over your writing samples that fit this position. THIS IS REQUIRED ALONG WITH THE VIDEO.
